noun.description: A disease caused by an uncontrolled division of abnormal cells in a part of the body.
examples: smoking is the major cause of lung cancer

proper noun.description: A constellation (the Crab), said to represent a crab crushed under the foot of Hercules. It is most noted for the globular star cluster of Praesepe (the Beehive cluster).
The fourth sign of the zodiac, which the sun enters at the northern summer solstice (about June 21).
